name: Magic Fantasy
introduce: Magic Fantasy is a Web3 strategic card game on Binance Smart Chain. In Magic Fantasy, stories and missions are started by the war of Light and Dark, which players need to form their own team to battle for the victory. At the same time, Magic Fantasy integrate tools of AIGC, all the in-game NFTs at early stage will be generated by AIGC and will release the creation power of equipment, gameplay…etc, so as to motivate the players become creators.
